login.__description: These keys are used by the <AuthPage type='login' /> components.
login.title: Sign in to your account

forgotPassword.__description: These key are used by the <AuthPage type='forgotPassword' /> components.
forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?

register.__description: These keys are used by the <AuthPage type='register' /> components.
register.title: Sign up for your account

updatePassword.__description: These keys are used by the <AuthPage type='updatePassword' /> components.
updatePassword.title: Update password

error.__description: These keys are used by the <ErrorPage /> components.
error.info: You may have forgotten to add the {{action}} component to {{resource}} resource.
error.404: Sorry, the page you visited does not exist.
error.resource404: Are you sure you have created the {{resource}} resource.

actions.__description: These keys are used by the @refinedev/kbar package.

buttons.__description: These keys are used by the buttons and breadcrumbs.
buttons.notAccessTitle: You don't have permission to access

warnWhenUnsavedChanges: Are you sure you want to leave? You have unsaved changes.

notifications.__description: These keys are used by the notification provider.
notifications.createError: There was an error creating {{resource}} (status code: {{statusCode}})

dashboard.__description: This key is used by <Layout /> components to display the dashboard item in sidebar.
dashboard.title: Dashboard

posts.__description: These keys are used in translations for the 'posts' resource.

table.__description: This key is used by Inferencer components in 'list' views.

documentTitle.__description: These keys are used by the <DocumentTitleHandler /> components.

autoSave.__description: These keys are used by the <AutoSaveIndicator /> and the auto-save feature.
